CustomField.description: The number of intervals between invoices. Works with the Pending Invoice Item Interval field. For example, Interval = Month and Interval Count = 3 bills every 3 months. Maximum of one year interval allowed (1 year, 12 months, or 52 weeks).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of intervals between invoices. Works with the Pending Invoice Item Interval field. For example, Interval = Month and Interval Count = 3 bills every 3 months. Maximum of one year interval allowed (1 year, 12 months, or 52 weeks).
CustomField.label: Pending Invoice Item Interval Count
